trans-unit.source: Controls run-time behavior of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> associated with an operation.
trans-unit.target: Controla o comportamento de tempo de execução do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>associado uma operação.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The XmlSerializerOperationBehavior enables control of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> options, such as the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: O XmlSerializerOperationBehavior permite o controlo das <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>Opções, tais como a <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute> </xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior"></xref> class with a specific operation.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior"> </xref> classe com uma operação específica.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of mappings between XML schema elements and CLR data types.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de mapeamentos entre elementos de esquema XML e tipos de dados CLR.
